name: Shah's Halal Food
address: Shah's Halal Food, 1124 Boylston St, Boston, MA 02115, USA

other_info.description: About Us Welcome to Shahs Halal Boston We are excited to now be open in the Boston community! Stop in to try all of our delicious halal meals. Are you ready for healthy and savory Halal cuisine served within minutes? Here at Shah's Halal Boston we believe in giving you a quick serve meal cooked fresh every day. Our high quality meats and vegetables are served with our signature Hot Sauce, White Sauce, Green Sauce and more. Choose between a Gyro, Platter, Wrap or Salad. Pick your protein, any options, and whatever sauce or extras you choose.

menu_items.name: Combo over RICE (Lamb (contains beef) & Chicken)
menu_items.description: Delicious meal of juicy chicken marinated and ground lamb **(contains beef)** mixed with finest herbs and spices, grilled to perfection and served over our signature aromatic basmati rice and salad of your choice.

menu_items.name: Kofta Kabab over RICE
menu_items.description: Two skewers of freshly ground chicken mixed with fresh herbs and spices, chopped into small pieces, served over our signature aromatic basmati rice and salad of your choice.

menu_items.name: Fish over RICE
menu_items.description: All-white swai filet, dipped in famous shahs batter, served over our signature aromatic basmati rice and salad of your choice.

menu_items.name: Chapli & Chips Over RICE
menu_items.description: Chicken or Beef chapli kebab made from ground meat, mixed with the finest herbs and spices served with our signature aromatic basmati rice and/or salad, and our special pakora chips.

menu_items.description: A delicious meal of juicy chicken marinated and grilled to perfection served over our signature aromatic basmati rice and salad of your choice.

reviews: I was pleasantly surprised—the food surpassed my expectations. I really enjoyed the Philly cheese steak sandwich, and my friends liked theirs too: the fried chicken sandwich and lamb gyro. When they say spicy, they mean spicy. It is casual dining, fast-food style. Especially because there are not a lot of halal places in the area, this was a great find for us!

I hadn’t been to Shah’s Halal in over a year, so I decided to revisit. The price of the rice plates has gone up a bit to $11.99 - not a dealbreaker on its own. However, the meal has also fallen victim to shrinkflation. The takeout box is noticeably smaller and shallower, with a portion size comparable to a bare-bones Chipotle bowl (the kind you get when you order online and feel shortchanged). Even the utensils have shrunk - the plastic spoon looks like it's about two-thirds the size of a standard one.

Shah’s used to be cheap, fast, and filling. That value proposition has diminished.
The food was amazing! Definitely a good place for people in the lowell area to try out. Food is fresh and service is great.
Chris and his team’s customer service is off the hook. Best food in Vernon!!! I wish I could give 10 stars

Food: I got the salad platter with chicken & lamb. It was rather bland in flavor, all I could taste is diluted white sauce which should be more creamy, tangy, and garlicky. They did put a good amount of chicken and taste rather tender, but ediable at best. The lamb wasn't as gamey which isn't bad but I didn't nearly had the same amount as I did with the chicken.

Service: The service was fine, they made sure I got everything I wanted in my salad. There's muiltiple team-members helping you out in the stations so pay attention to where your food is going as each section moves.

Ambiance:It was during a rush after a concert ended so it was a bit chaotic, it's small and def gives off the vibe of when you're out and hungry, this is the place to grab a quick bite.

Location accommodation: They have a limited ourdoor seating and there barely side parking as this is near a college so theres quite amount of people traffic passing by.
